text:
@realDonaldTrump @FoxNews @CNN @OANN @newsmax #COVID cases in Canada are down 82% from their peak.

#COVIDー19  cases in Italy are down 97% from their peak.

#CoronaVirus cases in New Zealand are down 100% from their peak.

The #CoronavirusPandemic in the USA is higher than ever and out of control.

That's the Trump Virus.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in New Zealand
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information about the COVID-19 situation from the government, health authorities and other trusted sources across New Zealand. For more, visit https://covid19.govt.nz/.
